org.mitre.oauth2.repository

Interface AuthorizationCodeRepository


  • public interface AuthorizationCodeRepository
    Interface for saving and consuming OAuth2 authorization codes as AuthorizationCodeEntitys.
    Author:
    aanganes

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.OAuth2Authentication consume(String code)
      Consume an authorization code.
      AuthorizationCodeEntity save(AuthorizationCodeEntity authorizationCode)
      Save an AuthorizationCodeEntity to the repository

    • Method Detail

      • save

        AuthorizationCodeEntity save(AuthorizationCodeEntity authorizationCode)
        Save an AuthorizationCodeEntity to the repository
        Parameters:
        authorizationCode - the AuthorizationCodeEntity to save
        Returns:
        the saved AuthorizationCodeEntity

      • consume

        org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.OAuth2Authentication consume(String code)
                                                                          throws org.springframework.security.oauth2.common.exceptions.InvalidGrantException
        Consume an authorization code.
        Parameters:
        code - the authorization code value
        Returns:
        the authentication associated with the code
        Throws:
        org.springframework.security.oauth2.common.exceptions.InvalidGrantException - if no AuthorizationCodeEntity is found with the given value
